Alpha Tester.description: Awarded to everyone who joined before or on the 7th of June, 2019 (AEST).

Bug Hunter.description: Awarded to anyone who finds and reports a bug in the game, be it game logic, website stability, or other problems.

Capture The Flag.description: This badge is stolen by successful attacks. It is automatically set as your active badge, and you can't change it until it is lost; it also sets your name to yellow, so everyone knows you have it. Only one exists.

Combat Master.description: Awared to anyone who successfully attacks 100 times.

Developer.description: This badge is granted to the developers of Kingdom Battles.

Gold Horde.description: This badge is purchased for 1000 gold.

King Of The Hill.description: Awarded to anyone who keeps their position at the top of the game ladder for 24 hours.

Referral Linker.description: Awarded to anyone who successfully referred another player to Kingdom Battles.

Supporter.description: Awarded to anyone who contributes real world cash to the development and maintenance of Kingdom Battles.

Error.description: This is not an official badge. This image is used as a placeholder, or when something internal has gone wrong. If you see this badge anywhere other than the badge list, please report it for a reward.
